entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
